TopicTitle: Kerbal Calander, launch windows, and a pork-chop chart

Articles.Content: Now that the saved games have a clock, would it be helpful to have a calander? Could we than as a community work on when the best launch windows are and maybe debvelope a pork-chop chart? Sorry if this has been talked about already.
This informations could be very useful during mission planning !
Would this involve Kerbalising the names of months & days? Because it should.

Saw pork-chop.

Stopped reading.

Got lunch.

I can't be the only one.

Ok...serious time. That would be awesome. If I knew how to compute it, I'd definitely help...but I don't.

so Kerbin completes a day in 6 hours but the game clock is in earth days, 24 hours. unless a kerbin "day" is 6 sunrises? i think maybe squad should change the time to Kerbin time in the game. but regardless, coming up with the best launch windows shouldn't be that hard, right?
and yes, we should be Kerbalising the calander

Jebruary is my favorite month.

Mine is Jebral.
How about Jebuary, Billuary, Bob, Ascentpril, May-day!, Dune, Jool-y, Apoapsis, Boostember, Struttober, Canardvember, Disassembler?
